# Django field FileManager

## Build docker image for development

```
make build
```

## Tests

### Run tests

```
make tests
```

## Development

### Run makemigrations

```
make makemigrations
```

### Run migrations

```
make migrate
```

### Run server

```
make runserver
```

### Create admin user

```
make createsuperuser
```

## System (TODO)

### Ubuntu

```
apt-get install poppler-utils
```

### Mac

```
brew install poppler
```
